name: LAKSHMAN ATMAKURI

education.degree: Bachelor of Computer Science and Engineering

projects.name: University Management System
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive web-based platform to streamline and modernize administrative workflows within academic institutions. Implemented user roles for administrators, faculty members, and students, each with tailored features such as dashboards for managing user accounts, course offerings, attendance tracking, and detailed reporting. Utilized frontend technologies like HTML, Bootstrap, JavaScript, and React.js for an intuitive user interface. Employed backend technologies including MongoDB, Node.js, and Express.js for robust data management and server-side logic execution.

projects.name: Sentiment Analysis of YouTube comments through word clouds
projects.description: Implemented sentiment analysis on YouTube comments using a rule-based approach, employing tools such as VADER, NLTK, Pandas, and Google Colab. Utilized the VADER lexicon for sentiment analysis on YouTube comments, resulting in a structured data frame presenting sentiment scores and percentages, and further visualized the outcomes through positive and negative word clouds.

projects.name: Wine Quality Prediction
projects.description: Developed a predictive model using machine learning algorithms (Random Forest, Logistic Regression, Gaussian Naive Bayes) achieving 78.60 accuracy to assess wine quality based on chemical properties. Implemented data preprocessing, feature selection, model evaluation, and ensembling techniques to optimize performance. Implemented a data visualization and Analyzed dataset patterns and trends, providing actionable insights for winemakers to optimize production processes and enhance overall wine quality.

projects.name: Expense Tracker System
projects.description: Developed a Java-based Expense Tracking System for managing personal expenses, utilizing VSCode and the Java Virtual Machine. Implemented features such as adding, displaying, and calculating total expenses to enhance financial management.

projects.name: Hospital Management System
projects.description: Designed a comprehensive Hospital Management System in Python using Python IDLE, featuring distinct modules for reading, writing, and data manipulation. Leveraged CSV files for seamless storage, access, and updates, optimizing healthcare data management.

experiences.description: Developed a clone of the Amazon e-commerce website as part of the IBM SkillsBuild internship. Created a responsive and engaging user interface using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.js. Implemented features such as product listings, shopping cart, and user authentication to mimic core functionalities of the original site.

experiences.company_name: Andhra Pradesh State Skill Development Corporation
experiences.description: Conducted a comprehensive data analysis on the IMDB dataset, involving tasks such as data cleaning, preprocessing, analysis, visualization, and interpretation. Enabled stakeholders to gain actionable insights from complex data sets, leading to a 30percent improvement in box office performance through data-driven decision-making.

degree: Bachelor of Computer Science and Engineering
